results.title: High Dose of Metformin Decreases Susceptibility to Occlusive Arterial Thrombosis in Diabetic Mice

results.title: Metformin causes a reduction in basal and post-venous occlusion plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 in type 2 diabetic patients.
results.text_hl: ...The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the fibrinolytic system were studied pre- and @<m>DISEASE_Arterial_Occlusive_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001157 @@@post-venous occlusion@@@ in 38 @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in a double-blind, placebo-controlled trial.

citations.NLM: Grant PJ, Stickland MH, Booth NA, Prentice CR. Metformin causes a reduction in basal and post-venous occlusion plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 in type 2 diabetic patients. Diabet Med. 1991 May;8(4):361-5. PMID: 1713132

results.title: Association between clinical outcomes and metformin use in adults with sickle cell disease and diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: This is a retrospective cohort study using the MarketScan Medicaid claims database for 2006 to 2016, comparing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users and nonusers.

results.title: Reversal of diabetes-induced rat graft transplant coronary artery disease by metformin.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Arterial_Occlusive_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001157 @@@luminal occlusion@@@ and severe TxCAD in the larger vessels but did not alter the course of TxCAD in the smaller vessels.

citations.NLM: Cantin B, Zhu D, Wen P, Panchal SN, Dai X, Gwathmey JK, Reaven GM, Valantine HA. Reversal of diabetes-induced rat graft transplant coronary artery disease by metformin. J Heart Lung Transplant. 2002 Jun;21(6):637-43. PMID: 12057696
